title: Youth stabbed to death in Jashore
body: A 22-year-old youth was stabbed to death near Ansar Camp at Bejpara in Jashore town on Saturday midnight Tanvir, son of Mintu from Shankarpur Hazarigat, was found bleeding near the camp around 12:55am. People of the area took him to Jashire 250-Bed General Hospital where doctors declared him dead. Kotwali model police inspector, investigation, Kazi Babul Hossain said that Tanvir was stabbed past midnight and a rickshaw driver took him to the hospital. The police said that they recovered 61 Yaba pills from his pocket. Earlier on Saturday evening, a joint team conducted an operation at Shankarpur Beler Maidan and detained two youths along with five bombs and a knife. Tanvir had escaped the scene during the drive and the detainees told the police that the seized explosives belonged to him. Investigation into the murder is ongoing, said the police.
